text: Narcissus gaditanus is a species of the genus Narcissus (daffodils) in the family Amaryllidaceae. It is classified in Section Juncifolii, and is native to the southern Iberian Peninsula. ==Etymology== The specific epithet, gaditanus, means "pertaining to Gades" (now Cadiz). ==References== gaditanus Category:Garden plants Category:Flora of Spain Category:Taxa named by Pierre Edmond Boissier Category:Taxa named by George François Reuter
title: Narcissus gaditanus
